title: Hilton bullish on India, aims to triple its supply
description: Hilton has 7,626 properties globally spanning 1,197,329 rooms across 126 countries and territories. Silcock said in Q1 of 2024, the chain approved a little under 30,000 new rooms for its pipeline.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
